feature_model.name: Distribution
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Distribution (f_Distribution) :m LocationMonitor (f_LocationMonitor) :m PowerMonitor (f_PowerMonitor) :m Agent (f_Agent) :m Representation (f_Representation) :m CPUMonitor (f_CPUMonitor) :m Coordination (f_Coordination) :m Forward (f_Forward) :m RoutePlanning (f_RoutePlanning) :m Content Sharing (f_Content_Sharing) :m SecurityNotification (f_SecurityNotification) :m Monitoring (f_Monitoring) :o ACLBased (f_ACLBased) :o StringBased (f_StringBased) :o JadePlugin (f_JadePlugin) :o BluePlugin (f_BluePlugin) :o SolPlugin (f_SolPlugin)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_1:~f_JadePlugin or f_ACLBased constraint_2:~f_SolPlugin or f_StringBased constraint_3:~f_BluePlugin or f_StringBased
